effects: You can cast Beast Sense and Speak with Animals as rituals.
Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for them.
Bear: while Rage is active, you have resistance to all damage except force, necrotic, psychic, and radiant.
Eagle: when you activate Rage, you can take the Disengage and Dash actions as part of that bonus action; while Rage is active, you can take a bonus action to take both actions.
Wolf: while Rage is active, your allies have advantage on attack rolls against enemies within 5 feet of you.
Owl: you gain darkvision 60 feet (or extend existing darkvision by 60 feet).
Panther: you gain a climb speed equal to your speed.
Salmon: you gain a swim speed equal to your speed.
limits: You can change the choice after each long rest.

effects: You can cast Commune with Nature as a ritual.
Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for it.
Falcon: while Rage is active, you have a fly speed equal to your speed if you arent wearing armor.
Lion: while Rage is active, enemies within 5 feet of you have disadvantage on attack rolls against targets other than you or another barbarian with this option active.
Ram: while Rage is active, when you hit a Large or smaller creature with a melee attack, you can knock it prone.
